meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Dan Sims Morgan Kruse Paul Nelson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6483.

td.p: Dan Sims, a case manager from Little Rock, Arkansas
Morgan Kruse, an economics research analyst from Irvine, California
Paul Nelson, a Senate staff aide originally from Iowa City, Iowa (whose 3-day cash winnings total $45,400)

tr.td: GENERAL PRACTICE
1-LETTER STOCK SYMBOLS
(Alex: We're talking about the New York Stock Exchange here.)
POETRY TERMS
ANAGRAMS
IT'S A TRAP!
CELEBRITIES' FAVORITE MOVIES

Morgan

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Paul
Morgan
Dan
(Alex: The first category in Double Jeopardy! sounds a lot--sounds exactly like the first round--but with a twist...)
GENERAL PRACTICE
PLANETARY MATTERS?
(Alex: I'm not sure.)
ODD WORDS
"THE" TV SHOW
THAT IS THE QUESTION
BALTIMORE
(Alex: ...where we have a new home--WBFF, Fox45.)

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans.
